name: The Toilette of Psyche from The Story of Psyche tapestry series
maker: After design by François Boucher, woven under the direction of Nicolas Besnier, and Jean-Baptiste Oudry, et al
description: The Toilette of Psyche from The Story of Psyche tapestry series; After design by François Boucher (French, 1703 - 1770), woven under the direction of Nicolas Besnier (French, 1714 - 1754), and Jean-Baptiste Oudry (French, 1686 - 1755), et al; Beauvais, France; about 1741 - 1742; Wool and silk; modern cotton lining; 335.3 × 266.7 cm (132 × 105 in.); 63.DD.2; Gift of J. Paul Getty; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Toilette of Psyche from The Story of Psyche tapestry series
medium: Wool and silk; modern cotton lining
